titles.title: Are you washed by the water

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Are you washed by the water,
washed by the water of the Word?
Are you washed by the water,
washed by the water of the Word?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yes I'm washed by the water,
washed by the water of the Word!
Yes I'm washed by the water,
washed by the water of the Word!
